lead_paragraph: Being a modernist with the heart of a child informs the sunny, slightly off-kilter fashion of the up-and-coming French designer.

headline.main: A Cheeky Peek Into the Life of Simon Porte Jacquemus

snippet: Being a modernist with the heart of a child informs the sunny, slightly off-kilter fashion of the up-and-coming French designer.
abstract: French fashion designer Simon Porte Jacquemus showcases photos of various artworks, apparel and architecture that inspire his playful modernist aesthetic.
